verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
On the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> of the first<WH259> month<WH2320> shall you set<WH6965> up the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>
And you shall put<WH7760> therein<WH8033> the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> and cover<WH5526> the ark<WH727> with the veil.<WH6532>

And you shall bring<WH935> in the table,<WH7979> and set in order<WH6186> the things that are to be set in order<WH6187> on it; and you shall bring<WH935> in the candlestick,<WH4501> and light<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> thereof.

And you shall set<WH5414> the altar<WH4196> of gold<WH2091> for the incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the testimony,<WH5715> and put<WH7760> the hanging<WH4539> of the door<WH6607> to the tabernacle.<WH4908>
And you shall set<WH5414> the altar<WH4196> of the burnt<WH5930> offering before<WH6440> the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of the congregation.<WH4150>
And you shall set<WH5414> the laver<WH3595> between<WH996> the tent<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> and the altar,<WH4196> and shall put<WH5414> water<WH4325> therein.<WH8033>
And you shall set<WH7760> up the court<WH2691> round<WH5439> about, and hang<WH5414> up the hanging<WH4539> at the court<WH2691> gate.<WH8179>

And you shall take<WH3947> the anointing<WH4888> oil,<WH8081> and anoint<WH4886> the tabernacle,<WH4908> and all<WH3605> that is therein, and shall hallow<WH6942> it, and all<WH3605> the vessels<WH3627> thereof: and it shall be holy.<WH6944>

And you shall anoint<WH4886> the altar<WH4196> of the burnt<WH5930> offering, and all<WH3605> his vessels,<WH3627> and sanctify<WH6942> the altar:<WH4196> and it shall be an altar<WH4196> most<WH6944> holy.<WH6944>
And you shall anoint<WH4886> the laver<WH3595> and his foot,<WH3653> and sanctify<WH6942> it.
And you shall bring<WH7126> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> to the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and wash<WH7364> them with water.<WH4325>
And you shall put<WH3847> on Aaron<WH175> the holy<WH6944> garments,<WH899> and anoint<WH4886> him, and sanctify<WH6942> him; that he may minister to me in the priest's<WH3547> office.
And you shall bring<WH7126> his sons,<WH1121> and clothe<WH3847> them with coats:<WH3801>

And you shall anoint<WH4886> them, as you did anoint<WH4886> their father,<WH1> that they may minister to me in the priest's<WH3547> office: for their anointing<WH4888> shall surely be an everlasting<WH5769> priesthood<WH3550> throughout their generations.<WH1755>
Thus did<WH6213> Moses:<WH4872> according to all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him, so<WH3651> did<WH6213> he.
And it came<WH1961> to pass in the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> in the second<WH8145> year,<WH8141> on the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> that the tabernacle<WH4908> was reared<WH6965> up.

And Moses<WH4872> reared<WH6965> up the tabernacle,<WH4908> and fastened<WH5414> his sockets,<WH134> and set<WH7760> up the boards<WH7175> thereof, and put<WH5414> in the bars<WH1280> thereof, and reared<WH6965> up his pillars.<WH5982>

And he spread<WH6566> abroad<WH6566> the tent<WH168> over<WH5921> the tabernacle,<WH4908> and put<WH7760> the covering<WH4372> of the tent<WH168> above<WH4605> on it; as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And he took<WH3947> and put<WH5414> the testimony<WH5715> into<WH413> the ark,<WH727> and set<WH7760> the staves<WH905> on<WH5921> the ark,<WH727> and put<WH5414> the mercy<WH3727> seat above<WH4605> on the ark:<WH727>

And he brought<WH935> the ark<WH727> into<WH413> the tabernacle,<WH4908> and set<WH7760> up the veil<WH6532> of the covering,<WH4539> and covered<WH5526> the ark<WH727> of the testimony;<WH5715> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he put<WH5414> the table<WH7979> in the tent<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> on the side<WH3409> of the tabernacle<WH4908> northward,<WH6828> without<WH2351> the veil.<WH6532>
And he set<WH6186> the bread<WH3899> in order<WH6186> on it before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> as the LORD<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And he put<WH7760> the candlestick<WH4501> in the tent<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> over<WH5227> against<WH5227> the table,<WH7979> on<WH5921> the side<WH3409> of the tabernacle<WH4908> southward.<WH5045>
And he lighted<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he put<WH7760> the golden<WH2091> altar<WH4196> in the tent<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH6440> the veil:<WH6532>
And he burnt<WH6999> sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004> thereon;<WH5921> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he set<WH7760> up the hanging<WH4539> at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And he put<WH7760> the altar<WH4196> of burnt<WH5930> offering by the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and offered<WH5927> on it the burnt<WH5930> offering <WH4503>and the meat offering; as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
And he set<WH7760> the laver<WH3595> between<WH996> the tent<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> and the altar,<WH4196> and put<WH5414> water<WH4325> there,<WH8033> to wash<WH7364> with.
And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> washed<WH7364> their hands<WH3027> and their feet<WH7272> thereat:

When they went<WH935> into<WH413> the tent<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and when they came<WH7126> near<WH7126> to the altar,<WH4196> they washed;<WH7364> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And he reared<WH6965> up the court<WH2691> round<WH5439> about the tabernacle<WH4908> and the altar,<WH4196> and set<WH5414> up the hanging<WH4539> of the court<WH2691> gate.<WH8179> So Moses<WH4872> finished<WH3615> the work.<WH4399>
Then a cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> the tent<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the tabernacle.<WH4908>

And Moses<WH4872> was not able<WH3201> to enter<WH935> into<WH413> the tent<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> because<WH3588> the cloud<WH6051> stayed<WH7931> thereon,<WH5921> and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the tabernacle.<WH4908>
And when the cloud<WH6051> was taken<WH5927> up from over<WH5921> the tabernacle,<WH4908> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went<WH5265> onward in all<WH3605> their journeys:<WH4550>
But if<WH518> the cloud<WH6051> were not taken<WH5927> up, then they journeyed<WH5265> not till<WH5704> the day<WH3117> that it was taken<WH5927> up.

For the cloud<WH6051> of the LORD<WH3068> was on the tabernacle<WH4908> by day,<WH3119> and fire<WH784> was on it by night,<WH3915> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> throughout all<WH3605> their journeys.<WH4550>
